column3: She's sick of this town,, she's sick of that boy
column4: Yeah she's sick of dreams that never take flight
column5: There's gotta be more than the same old story
column6: So she's gonna turn the page tonight
column7: And turn the radio up (turn the radio up)
column9: She got a full tank of gas (she got a full tank of gas)
column13: She's got the pedal to the floor in a hand-me-down Ford
column14: Yeah,, the only thing that's left to do
column15: Is catch a couple green lights and those baby blue eyes
column16: Are leaving nothing in that rearview
column20: She's fighting back tears,, she's fighting back years
column21: Of the only life she's ever known
column22: There's a future that's bright in the dead of this night
column23: And all she's gotta do is go
column24: And turn the radio up (turn the radio up)
column26: She got an open road (she got an open road)
